description: Certificate of Lawfulness for change of use from C3 dwelling to C2 residential children's home for up to three children age 8 - 17years, and 2 carers living together.
decision_conditions: The proposed use of the application site as a children's home for a maximum of 3 children and a maximum of 6 people overall in the terms described in the application and additional information received would not result in a material change of use from the existing use as a Class C3 dwelling house, even though the proposed use in itself would fall within Use Class C2 of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes Order) 1987 (as amended).  As such, the proposal does not constitute development and so planning permission is not required.
It is the responsibility of the applicant to ensure that adequate provision is made for 3 car parking spaces on site, prior to first use, to accord with the terms of the submitted details.

Should the circumstances of the property/occupants and activities change it may be that planning permission would be required. It is the responsibility of the applicant to ensure that the operations associated with 19 Spencer Road
